alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 4:36AM PST until December 19 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills above 1500 feet. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will rapidly lower from around 6000 feet this afternoon to as low as 1000 feet by midnight tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
